close via #5913
Thanks for @AlbumenJ 's great work

The tests in dubbo-registry-consul requires download consol binary from releases.hashicorp.com. 
Maybe you can check your network connection to releases.hashicorp.com.

related codes are in `com.pszymczyk.consul`

```
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.pszymczyk.consul</groupId>
            <artifactId>embedded-consul</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
```

```
package com.pszymczyk.consul.infrastructure

class HttpBinaryRepository {

    public static final String CONSUL_BINARY_CDN = "CONSUL_BINARY_CDN"
    public static final String CONSUL_DEFAULT_CDN = "https://releases.hashicorp.com/consul/"

    File getConsulBinaryArchive(String version, File file) {
        httpsProtocolsSetter.setRequiredTls(System.getProperty("java.version"), System.getProperty("https.protocols"))
        String os = OsResolver.resolve()
        String cdn = System.getenv(CONSUL_BINARY_CDN) != null ? System.getenv(CONSUL_BINARY_CDN)
                : System.getProperty(CONSUL_BINARY_CDN) != null ? System.getProperty(CONSUL_BINARY_CDN) : CONSUL_DEFAULT_CDN;
        String url = "${cdn}${version}/consul_${version}_${os}_amd64.zip"
        OutputStream outputStream = file.newOutputStream()
        outputStream << new URL(url).openStream()
        outputStream.close()
        file
    }
}
```

`releases.hashicorp.com` is accessable. could you please check your network connection again?
If you only want to build jar file, you can skip tests by adding `-DskipTests`
related doc link: https://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-8.5-doc/api/org/apache/catalina/connector/Connector.html#setProtocol(java.lang.String)

I agree this is some code smell we can optimize. Also I notice the hard coded string for newline `\r\n`.  

We are happy to accept any PR which can help to fix code smell.
Thank you very much! Currently I'm fixing the network
I'll try PR for the first time
Which branch should I target if I initiate PR? 3. X-dev?
I just confirm this code is in master branch too. Could you please try open PR to master branch?
ok

虽然看上去很美好 但是感觉还是比较有风险 比如attachement传递会否丢失 耗时有否增加
建议使用DeprecatedFilter加上过时 到时对应研发会打印错误日志可以翻看之后进行解决 这样会安全一些

https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/5871 seems to occur for the same reason with https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/5885 and https://github.com/apache/dubbo/issues/5889

So the first time you go into the for loop you're going to go into the if (leastActive == -1 || active < leastActive) because leastActive starts at negative 1, and then if you go into the else if (active == leastActive) logic the I of the for loop is definitely greater than 0, so you don't have to say I >0.
@qiaolin-li  thanks for your PR. I just double check this change and notice that the previous code rely on exceptions is not empty. so which means this change is not equivalent to previous code.
I don't understand what you mean..

sorry @qiaolin-li , I think it's my mistake when I first time look at the issue you raised.
I test this change in my local, It's possible if one stream open fail, so exceptions map can be empty, so we can't print `, possible causes:` in error message
close this issue. more detail refer to #5920

Dubbo-Admin那边也只能陪着条件路由和标签路由，没有自定义路由的配置
同样遇到此类问题，重写GenericFilter拦截自定义的异常无效了,还没有找到优雅的绝决方案。泛化调用时，提供者返回的结果对象，都会加入class属性。
dubbo不是通过注册中心链接的 只是发现 实质上还得provider和consumer互相联通才行

@htynkn If needed.Can we replace `Date date = new SimpleDateFormat(DATE_FORMAT).parse(string);` with `Date date = org.apache.commons.lang3.time.DateUtils.parseDate(string, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "yyyy-MM-dd");`?
配置了路由的话，在对应/duubo/xxx.xxx.XxxService/routers下会有相应的节点生成的

> 消费方传输的参数中一旦包含有数组字段，且数组中包含 null元素，服务提供方会抛NullPointerException

>如果服务提供方的Dubbo Filter中抛出了异常，那么消费方接收到的RpcException的code均为 RpcException.NETWORK_EXCEPTION，给消费方的异常判断造成了困扰

以上两点在接下来的版本会进行修复

> 如果服务提供方的Dubbo Filter中抛出了异常，那么消费方接收到的RpcException的code均为 RpcException.NETWORK_EXCEPTION，给消费方的异常判断造成了困扰

> 在早期的版本中，泛化调用时，路由规则是不生效的

这两点会进一步予以确认

I think this is an issue that deserves further investigation.

This  for dubbo-2.6.x

多中心配置实现
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12825873/77870299-98e26200-7273-11ea-9f6b-d483b5452bf2.png)

这种配置是在开发环境用，大部分服务都注册到一个中心，要开发的注册到另外新的中心，这样方便开发不用起太多微服务，有个需求就是自己本地的微服务不能注册到公共注册中心上只能注册到本地心中。开发启动一堆微服务很麻烦
尝试了很多种写法, 也指定了class, 还是失败, 不知道问题出在哪里.
和 #5748 应该是一个问题。 `({"userList":[{"1":{"accountMobile":"15052234567"},"class":"java.util.HashMap"}]}) `这样是可行的

在springboot的配置文件application.properties加入:
>spring.application.name=dubboProvider

服务器启动不报错。

> 服务器启动不报错。

Yes, it can be fixed as you said, However, `dubbo.application.name` or correlative property has to configure in Spring scenarios.

感觉你这个重复造轮子了。官方有提供dubbo网关，基于泛化调用：[https://github.com/apache/dubbo-proxy](https://github.com/apache/dubbo-proxy)，部署网关后，通过postman请求网关api，能达到你这个一样的效果

> 感觉你这个重复造轮子了。官方有提供dubbo网关，基于泛化调用：https://github.com/apache/dubbo-proxy，部署网关后，通过postman请求网关api，能达到你这个一样的效果

嗯 从调用过程上看这个效果是一样的。但是从使用上来说，dubbo-proxy还是需要先部署http接口然后通过postman来调用，整个过程比之dubbo-postman更繁琐，并且这些操作的接口都是不能集中维护和动态更新的。
我建议可以从使用了两个工具的对比后，可以更直接的感受到这个的差异。
可以这样来对比吧，我觉得可以把dubbo-proxy看作是dubbo-postman产品里面使用的一个具体实现功能。

Just now I notice your error message, the main error is `client-side timeout`. Perhaps this is the main reason because in general if a server shutdown the client reconnect it will come out `Connection refused` owing to closed port. But in k8s if a pod is totally closed, the ip cannot be connect no longer and the result may changed while the request is loopback in the k8s network or even turned to outside network. This maybe the issue of `doClient` function in `NettyClient`.

@bigbang555 Any update on this issue?

Maybe version comparison is the best method to guarantee order of notifications. Retry task will break order for single thread push in certain situations. We can tag versions(atomic incremental) all notifications(data) for the same url(type) when notifications are received, and store the newest version when nofications are processed successfully. Before notify method are processed, version comparison are processed at first.
However, other data(such as subscribe, register information) maybe have the same problem, this solution will affectted a lot of methods. Aop maybe an appropriate way for implement.
